ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: sanitised some type cast code for 63 bit systems
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c: added assembly_path to stats and also addFeatureModeCB ( )
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c: fix bug causing crash in stats code.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: defaults for 3 frame wrong so fixed them.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: partial fix bumping for 3 frame translation, columns remain too big on zoom.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapWebBrowser.c: really fixed query urls by quoting the URL with backslash-quotes
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapWebBrowser.c: fixed double free in web broswer interface
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2010_01_25.shtml: new zmap release notes for 25 January 2010
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2010_01_25.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 25/01/2010
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.9885/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow_P.h: make toggle protein/dna an internal function + fix my own stupid bug for dna toggle.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: fix some errors in 3 frame translation predefined style.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h: minor improvement to comments.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: make sure bump spacing is added to 3 frame bumping.
  • src/: zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: fix to RC feautre menu show DNA crash RT123891
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowDraw.c, zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow_P.h: Fixes bumping of 3 frame translation when shown as one column. Does not fix the issue where the column needs to shrink/expand on zooming
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapUtilsDebug.h: add small debug macro.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCollectionFeature.c: fix bugs in 'incomplete alignment' markers.
  • src/: zmapApp/zmapAppconnect.c, zmapApp/zmapAppwindow.c, zmapControl/zmapControl.c, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c, zmapView/zmapView.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: interim fix for
  • . Also include crash fix for 'a' key with no features selected
  • src/: Makefile.am, configure.ac: turn off doxygen stuff for now, can't see how to make it conditional.
  • src/runbootstrap: point to aclocal in /opt/local for macport.
  • src/zmapApp/: zmapAppconnect.c, zmapAppwindow.c: reinstitute 1,0 default for sequence start/end.
  • src/zmapControl/: zmapControlRemoteReceive.c, zmapControl_P.h: args for remoteinstaller wrong way round.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindow.c: fix bug where we end up with no window for change property for xremote on zmapControl window.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: clarify parent_span meaning.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControl.c: reverse change allowing start = 0
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: fix bug in setting up locus obj. for new feature which has a locus.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/blxview.c: Fixed a bug where exon boundaries were not being drawn at the correct positions when the exon is on the reverse strand of the match sequence
